alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys; Sonoma Coastal Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 1:10PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Marin, central Sonoma and west central Napa Counties through 200 PM PST... At 110 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sebastopol, or 13 miles west of Santa Rosa, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa, Rohnert Park, Windsor, Healdsburg, Cloverdale, Sebastopol, Cotati, St. Helena, Calistoga, Tomales, Roseland, South Santa Rosa Cdp, Larkfield-Wikiup, Dillon Beach, Forestville, Guerneville, Graton, Monte Rio, Occidental and Angwin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys; Sonoma Coastal Range
